Class Manager

java.lang.Object
BTO.Users
BTO.Manager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Admin, Search<String>
public class Manager extends Users implements Admin
Represents a Manager in the BTO system. A Manager is responsible for overseeing BTO project creation and maintenance. They are authorised to create, edit, and delete BTO projects, view applicant and officer applications, manage application statuses, and respond to user enquiries. This class extends Users and implements the Admin interface, inheriting user authentication, search filters, and BTO administrative functionalities. Key Responsibilities:
  • Create and edit BTO project details (room counts, dates, visibility, etc.)
  • Manage applicant and officer applications tied to their BTOs
  • Respond to user enquiries
  • Ensure no application date overlaps between BTOs they manage
The list of BTO projects managed by a Manager is tracked via their managingId list. Each Manager is identified uniquely and automatically assigned a role of "manager".
Version:
23/04/2025
Author:
Kah Teck, Keanan, Javier, Junnoske, Kevin

    • Manager

      public Manager(String nric, String name, int age, String password, boolean married)
      Constructs a new Manager user in the BTO system. Initialises with the "manager" role and sets up internal state.
      Parameters:
      nric - the NRIC of the manager
      name - the name of the manager
      age - the age of the manager
      password - the login password
      married - marital status

  • Method Details

    • getManaging

      public List<Integer> getManaging()
      Returns the list of BTO project IDs that the manager is managing.
      Returns:
      list of managed BTO IDs

    • addManagingBTO

      public void addManagingBTO(int btoId)
      Adds a BTO project to the manager's managed list.
      Parameters:
      btoId - the BTO project ID to add

    • viewBTOs

      public void viewBTOs(List<BTO> btoList, boolean own)
      Displays a list of BTOs, filtered to show either only those managed by this user or all.
      Parameters:
      btoList - the full list of BTOs
      own - true to show only managed BTOs, false for all

    • createBTO

      public BTO createBTO(Project<Users> userProj, List<BTO> managingBTO) throws ParseException, InputMismatchException, InvalidInput
      Creates a new BTO project via manager input. Validates date range and optional reassignment to another manager.
      Parameters:
      userProj - the project containing all users
      managingBTO - current list of BTOs managed by this user
      Returns:
      the new BTO project object
      Throws:
      ParseException - if the input date format is invalid
      InputMismatchException - for scanner input mismatches
      InvalidInput - if any field is invalid (e.g. manager not found, invalid dates)

    • editBTO

      public void editBTO(BTO bto) throws InputMismatchException, InvalidInput
      Allows manager to edit fields of an existing BTO project. Includes validations for ownership and input constraints.
      Parameters:
      bto - the BTO project to edit
      Throws:
      InputMismatchException - for scanner mismatches
      InvalidInput - if invalid fields or access violations occur

    • deleteBTO

      public void deleteBTO(int btoId)
      Removes a BTO from the manager’s list of managed projects. Does not remove from the global BTO list.
      Parameters:
      btoId - the ID of the BTO to remove

    • showMenu

      public void showMenu(Project<BTO> btoProj, Project<Application> appProj, Project<Enquiries> enquiryProj, Project<Users> userProj)
      Displays the main menu for the manager and handles all role-specific workflows. Includes creating, editing, viewing BTOs, replying to enquiries, and managing applications.
      Parameters:
      btoProj - the project containing all BTOs
      appProj - the project containing all applications
      enquiryProj - the project containing all enquiries
      userProj - the project containing all users

    • managingBTO

      public void managingBTO(List<Integer> managingId, Project<BTO> btoProj, Project<Application> appProj, Project<Enquiries> enquiryProj) throws InputMismatchException, InvalidInput
      Handles the "Manage BTO" menu for a manager. Enables access to applications, officer requests, enquiry replies, and BTO settings.
      Specified by:
      managingBTO in interface Admin
      Parameters:
      managingId - list of BTO project IDs managed by this user
      btoProj - the BTO data project
      appProj - the application data project
      enquiryProj - the enquiry data project
      Throws:
      InputMismatchException - for scanner issues
      InvalidInput - for invalid option selection or access

    • updateAppStatus

      public void updateAppStatus(Application app, int status, BTO bto)
      Updates the status of an application (officer or applicant) based on manager decisions. Handles authentication, availability of rooms, and success conditions.
      Parameters:
      app - the application to update
      status - 1 to accept, 2 to reject
      bto - the BTO project the application is tied to
